Nah, Gilgamesh is called the strongest servant for no reason. He would still fúck her up.

I doubt Gil can take her out easily without needing other servants' help. If anyone is playing FGO JP, they'll know that even in servant's vessel, her stats can be compared to those top tier ones and she isn't even in her full Remnants of Albion form. She also doesn't have "weak to EA" traits. And her NP, Hollow Heart Albion, is Anti-world level. So if anyone think X servant can take her out easily... They don't know shit.
